start.text: All those who oppose me shall fear my wrath.
Nothing will be hidden from our sight, destroy them all!

start_boss.text: I suppose the random hand of fate delivers us into them now.
A monstrosity exist in front of us. It is a disease. We are the cure.

retreat.text: We are due for a tactical retreat in our advantage.

hull_50.text: I have suffered worse than this, hold!

hull_30.text: Is this where I meet my end? No, now hold!
Hull status critical, but I will prevail.

death.text: Am I allowed to retire now?

victory.text: A victory today... but what of tomorrow?
